attributes.action: ASK FM TO REPORT ABUSE TO POLICE AND TAKE IP ADDRESS COMPULSARY
attributes.additional_details: Ask Fm Should Make Account Making Compulsory With Them Agreeing To Ask.Fm To Store There IP Address But Still Keep Anonymity By Letting The Person Post Something Anonymous, The Receiver Can Then Report The Post To Ask.Fm, Ask.Fm Then Can Either Forward To The Claim To The Police, Ban The Account, Ask.Fm Will Also Reply To The Receiver Explaining To Them What Action They Have Done. This Will Therefore Cut Down The Amount Of Trolls And Less Chance Of Cyberbullying
